title: Design for Printed Textile-Crosses, Series  #532
provenance: This collection was donated to the Cooper-Hewitt, National Design Museum in 1969 by Alexander Girard
medium: Colored pencil, graphite on white  tracing paper
description: Four horizontal rows of long, purple, green and pink rectangles that intersect with fourteen rows of vertical brown, yellow and blue rectangles to form pattern of crosses
name: Drawing
